name: Unity 2018b Shader Testing
description:
This is a shader showcase over a few week period of time for MSU MI-455 prototype 3. It's a collection of various shaders I made while experimenting and trying to learn how the shadergraph utility works.

Files:

Build.zip - contains compiled build of game, playable demonstration of all shaders

Assets.zip - contains asset folder for project if you want to look through all the shadergraphs (Unity Version 2018.1.0b8)

Controls:

Use WA to move forward/ backward, AD to move left/ right, and QE to move down/ up. Space and Shift slow you down or speed you up.
